title: Gatsby and Tom discuss their previous meeting and Gatsby's acquaintance with Daisy.
text:
few days later he took him to Duluth and
bought him a blue coat, six pairs of white duck trousers, and a
yachting cap. And when the Tuolomee left for the West Indies and the
Barbary Coast, Gatsby left too.

He was employed in a vague personal capacity

relations.explanation: Dan Cody ('Cody') asked him a few questions and found that he was quick and extravagantly ambitious. He was employed in a vague personal capacity
